attributes.action: demand that Eurotunnel allows more train companies to pass through its tunnel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition calls on the Prime Minister to demand that Eurotunnel scraps the current monopoly by Eurostar by allowing other train companies to operate services through the tunnel. This would improve quality and lower prices, while opening up more European destinations to travelling Britons. Environmentally, it will reduce the need to travel on polluting forms of transport.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Eurotunnel.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
